meanings.sent1: The clayed pot was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The artist used clayed tiles to decorate the wall.
meanings.sent3: The clayed statue looked like it was made by a skilled sculptor.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt clayed after working in the pottery studio all day.
meanings.sent5: The clayed surface of the vase had intricate patterns etched into it.

meanings.sent1: The clayed mixture was ready for molding.

meanings.sent3: The clayed substance felt cool and smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent4: The clayed dough resembled the texture of modeling clay.
meanings.sent5: The clayed mass hardened into a solid form after drying.

meanings.sent1: The clayed surface of the wall helped insulate the room.
meanings.sent2: The clayed fabric was waterproof and durable.
meanings.sent3: The clayed area of the garden retained moisture well.
meanings.sent4: The clayed skin mask rejuvenated her complexion.
